tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Doctor Roshny is a wonderful dentist. She examines thoroughly and explains about your teeth and gums clearly. She makes sure that you are not overwhelmed listening to  any major issues.  
Her  way of giving treatment is almost painless. At every step she informs you  calmly what she is doing.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Hi, Doctors! Good Afternoon to Everyone.
Today I went to check my dental checkup and is Awesome.
Here, Dr. Roshny mam and her team doing excellent work.
Dr. Roshny demonstrated expertise and professionalism, explaining each step with clarity and patience.
Dr. Roshny and the team are experts in their field, providing personalized care and attention to detail.
I highly recommend Capital Dental Care. Trust them with your smile - you won't regret it!
If you're looking for the best dental clinic in Kondapur for teeth whitening, look no further than Capital Dental Care.
Trust me, you'll leave with a dazzling smile and a newfound confidence!
I'm grateful for their excellent service.
Thank you, Capital Dental Care* *** ***** *** **** ****** ****** ** *********

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: She has always been good to my family.. We visit her for all our requirements regularly.. Well behaved person

tags: Wait time,
review:
Roshny is really a professional and she is calm and takes her time when it comes to treating patients. She explain the situation and suggests the patient with proper treatment instead of pushing the patient for unnecessary treatments. I went for fillings and am satisfied with the work she has done.
I would truly suggest her if anyone is looking for a dentist.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Recently I did wisdom teeth extraction from Dr. Roshny, with proper doctor guidelines, proper medication.. doctor was very supportive *** **** * **** ********* ***** ******* She guided me with every steps, overall experience was very good..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review: Doctor is friendly and has lot of patience. She explained the instructions properly to elderly patient and also did the procedure smoothly.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Dental Cavity Filling,RCT - Root Canal Treatment,
review:
Dr.Roshny and their staff were amazing, Doctor was very calming and kind. Went through everything really thoroughly with me, constantly reassured me and asked how I was through out the process. Dental instrumentation sound was a little  daunting however I was made to feel at ease. Rather than as a customer/patient to their hospital I was treated very humanly and  an almost painless experience. 
Gone are those days where you'll have trouble with x- rays being uncomfortable,  the newer tech offers faster and easier on mouth. Thank you Capital Dental Care and the staff.
reply_text: It was our pleasure to treat you. Thank you so much for the valuable feedback!

tags: None
review: I had the pleasure of receiving teeth cleaning and polishing services from Dr. Roshny at Capital Dental Care, and it was an exceptional experience. From the moment I walked in, Dr. Roshny's warm demeanor and professionalism put me at ease. She performed a thorough cleaning, paying attention to every detail, and left my teeth looking and feeling fantastic. The personalized care and gentle approach she demonstrated were truly commendable. I highly recommend Dr. Roshny to anyone in search of top-notch dental services. Thank you, Dr. Roshny, for your exceptional work and commitment to patient satisfaction!
reply_text: It was a pleasure to treat you! Thank you for your valuable feedback!

tags: None
review: I visited capital dental care and it is the best dental clinic in Sriramnagar, Kondapur. The ambience is very nice and hygienic. The entire check up process went very smoothly and I was explained everything properly. Dr.Yamini and Dr.Roshny were both very friendly and gave the best dental treatment. The teeth cleaning and polishing process was quick, simple and completely painless. I am very happy with the affordable treatment and thanks to them my smile is healthy and beautiful. I highly recommend the clinic to everyone looking for quality and ethical dental treatment.
reply_text: Thank you for the valuable feedback Seerat!

Very calm and composed.
